ingredients.content: 4 fresh portobello mushrooms, cut into slices (1 cm)
400 g fresh Swiss brown mushrooms, cut into quarters
100 g fresh shiitake mushrooms, cut into quarters
2 - 3 sprigs fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only, for garnishing

preparations.content: Place onion and garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add stock paste, tomato paste, wine, flour, paprika, lemon juice, half of the portobello mushrooms, 200 g of the Swiss brown mushrooms and 50 g of the shiitake mushrooms. Stir to combine with aid of spatula and cook <b>5 min/100°C//speed <b> .
Add all remaining mushrooms and sour cream, stir to combine with aid of spatula and cook <b>5 min/100°C//speed <b>. Garnish with parsley and serve with side of choice (see Tips).
